nodes.text: The NR knockoff was a cheap, faulty imitation of Kalibac Industries' fifth degree NR-5 Series Repair Droid produced and marketed by "Tredwall," a small company of outlaw techs in the Corporate Sector, in the year 2 BBY. It worked for nearly ten hours before completely frying all of its circuits. An individual known as Kraemr warned potential NR-5 buyers about Tredwall's NR knockoff on Cynabar's Droid Datalog.

The NR knockoff was first mentioned in Cynabar's Fantastic Technology: Droids, a Star Wars Legends supplement written by Drew Campbell and Eric S. Trautmann for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and released on April 1, 1997.
